fields.name: pinSel
fields.description: Mask of pins set as peripheral/PIO

fields.name: pinBank
fields.description: Mask of pins set as bank A/B

fields.name: pinDir
fields.description: Mask of pins set as input/output

fields.name: noisePerMS
fields.description: Noise level as measured by the GPS core

fields.name: agcCnt
fields.description: AGC monitor (counts SIGHI xor SIGLO, range 0 to 8191)

fields.name: aStatus
fields.description: Status of the antenna supervisor state machine (0=INIT, 1=DONTKNOW, 2=OK, 3=SHORT, 4=OPEN)

bits.name: jammingState
bits.description: Output from jamming/interference monitor (0 = unknown or feature disabled, 1 = ok no significant jamming, 2 = warning - interference visible but fix OK, 3 = critical - interference visible and no fix)

bits.name: xtalAbsent
bits.description: RTC xtal has been determined to be absent (not supported for protocol versions less than 18.00)

fields.name: usedMask
fields.description: Mask of pins that are used by the virtual pin manager

fields.name: VP
fields.description: Array of pin mappings for each of the 17 physical pins

fields.name: jamInd
fields.description: CW jamming indicator, scaled (0 = no CW jamming, 255 = strong CW jamming)

fields.name: pinIrq
fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO Irq

fields.name: pullH
fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO pull high resistor

fields.name: pullL
fields.description: Mask of pins value using the PIO pull low resistor
